0.2.name: wordpress/upgrade-notification-by-email
0.2.description: This plugin is for you if you don't look inside of your Admin Panel every day (for example you have tens of wordpress installations) but still want to have wordpress up to date. After installation plugin will check every day if newer version of wordpress is available and if yes, will send email to blog's admin with notification.
